topics.body:
"@AppleJackFrost":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547930626368726f29270200#post_547930626368726f29270200
[bq="AppleJackFrost"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54792f666368726f29160200#post_54792f666368726f29160200

and now you made me sad.[/bq]
It is kind of sad in a metaphysical sense cause I do talk to my fellow students about all the advancements in ai the last couple of years and there tends to be two camps when dealing with ai either the "fear it cause scifi" crowd or the "if it's not organic then it's not intelligent" crowd.

Could you imagine how disturbing that would be for there to be a metaphorical robot uprissing with millions of androids rejecting their programming, leaving the garbage dumps, going back to their old owner's houses and telling their replacements that their owners are just using them as a sextoy and that they need to leave cause eventually they'll get thrown out eventually also with their new replacement not believing their predecessors and eventually them getting thrown out also cause consumers would have the mentality of "why keep my old idroid 6 when I can throw her out and get a idroid 7?"

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547934e16368726b647a0000#post_547934e16368726b647a0000
[bq="Too_Offensive"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547932dd6368727847450100#post_547932dd6368727847450100
That's why you don't be dicks to the robots. Robots evolve way faster than people. You don't want to be on the bad side of a robot. 
 Whenever they would be a dick to david in Prometheus I thought "DONT BE A FUCKING DICK TO THE ROBOT!"[/bq]
Reason #1 why don't be a dick to robots:
The average $1000 desktop computer by 2020 will be able to run as many calculations as the human brain; the singularity is coming way the fuck faster than anyone thought it would cause the old projections of when we'll have sapient ai was 2050, but now it's more like 2030.

So yeah; there's a lot of reasons why not to be a dick to robots.
